channel.title: Aerotest Operations Inc. (R-098)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Informs that operator licensing exams rescheduled to the wk of 880411 instead of 880322-23.Exam contracted to EG&G Idaho,Inc.Ref matl should be received by EG&G no later than 880311.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: PNO-V-86-014:on 860331,earthquake w/magnitude of 5.3 on Richter Scale occurred approx 10 miles east of Fremont,CA.No damage observed at research reactor facilities.Rancho Seco did not feel effects of earthquake.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Advises of NRR reorganization.Telephone number of J Dosa changed.D Tondi new section leader for Nonpower Reactors & Safeguards Licensing Section.Correspondence should be addressed to NRC,attention Document Control Desk.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Requests one set of reference matl listed in encl one be furnished at least 60 days prior to OL exams scheduled for wk of 970604 to listed address.
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Lists types of applications which fall under 6-month billing process,per 840620 rev to 10CFR170, "Fees for Facilities & Matls Licenses & Other Regulatory Svcs...." Bills will be issued in Dec & June.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION (ADM)

item.title: Advises that presence & irradiation of explosives in reactor must be evaluated due to potential for damage to reactor. Evaluation requested establishing operating restrictions,max quantity of explosives allowed in facility & form.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: US ATOMIC ENERGY COMMISSION (AEC)

item.title: Further response to FOIA requests for documents re Dow Chemical Co of Midland,MI.Forwards Apps H,I,J & K documents. Documents also available in PDR.Document I-10 partially withheld (ref FOIA Exemption 6).
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO PUBLIC ENTITY/CITIZEN/ORGANIZATION/MEDIA, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION (ADM)

item.title: "Annual Summary of Changes,Tests & Experiments Performed at Aerotest Radiography & Research Reactor (ARRR),for Period Ending 850630." W/850806 ltr.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Exam rept 50-228/OL-92-01 on 921102-04.Exam results:all seven SRO passed written & operating portion of exam.Several operators demonstrated weaknesses,per standards set by facility requalification program.
item.description: EXAMINATION REPORT, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Forwards requalification exam rept 50-228/OL-92-01 administered on 921102-04.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Informs that DE Figueredo operator number SOP-50332 & VP Scott operator number SOP-70010 have been terminated & no longer needs to have an operating license,effective 930115.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: "Potential for Earthquake Rupture of Northern Calaveras Fault."

item.title: Ack receipt of 960715 ltr informing NRC of steps taken to correct violations noted in insp rept 50-228/96-01.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: "Annual Summary of Changes,Tests & Experiments Performed at Aerotest Radiography & Reasearch Reactor (ARRR),Docket 50-228,for Period Ending 960630." W/960701 ltr.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Responds to 960624 ltr re violations noted in Insp Rept 50-228/96-01.Corrective actions:apparent lack of controls rectified by locking door,leads to two access points on top of reactor.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Informs of decision to reduce fence area surveillance to twice in morning & twice in afternoon w/reactor shutdown during lunch,effective 960701,in view of listed observations.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Advises that SS Koblik now President of Reed College, replacing Acting President WR Haden on 920824.
item.author: REED COLLEGE, PORTLAND, OR

item.title: Notice of violation from insp during period of 960422-26. Violation noted:on 960426,inspector determined that 2 access points to high radiation area on top of reactor operations did not have one or more of listed control features.
item.description: NOTICE OF VIOLATION OF A REGULATION, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Insp rept 50-228/96-01 on 960422-26.Violations noted.Major areas inspected:organization & mgt controls,qualifications & training,special nuclear matl & accountability,reviews & audits,logs & records,procedures & reactor operations.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Forwards insp rept 50-228/96-01 during period of 960422-26 & NOV.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Notifies that full implementation of approved emergency plan accomplished on 840821 w/general meeting of all employees to discuss details of plan,in response to 841011 ltr.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Forwards "Annual Summary of Changes,Tests & Experiments Performed at Aerotest Radiography & Research Reactor," for period ending 920630.New 13 cubic feet demineralizer installed in demineralizer stage.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Insp Rept 50-228/85-01 on 850107-09.No violation or deviation noted.Major areas inspected:reactor operators requalification training,instrument calibr,worker radiation protection training,emergency planning & maint.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, MANUFACTURER/VENDOR/ENGINEER, INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS

item.title: Forwards Insp Rept 50-228/85-01 on 850107-09.No noncompliance noted.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Discusses advisability of frequent fuel element insps.No TS requirements exist for fuel element insps.Proposes that 20% insp of fuel elements take place each yr.Altered procedure will responsibly address both sides of dialogue.
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Notification of 960403 meeting w/graded QA volunteer plants in Rockville,MD to provide comments & feedback to staff re evaluation guidance prepared by staff for volunteer plant implementation phase of graded QA initiative.
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Advises that Endorsements 90 & 100 to nuclear liability insurance policy Agreement B-2 not received.Endorsements requested.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO UTILITY, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
